translations.translation: The name must not exceed 250 characters.
An error has occurred loading your Email Pro account.
An error has occurred loading your MX Plan account.
Do you need help configuring your Email Pro service?
Need help configuring your MX Plan email service?
Your Email Pro service is almost ready. You have to attach a domain to your service. If you don't have one, click here to buy one.
Your MX Plan email service is almost ready. You can link a domain name to your service. If you don't have a domain name, click here to buy one.
Are you sure you want to delete the following alias for your Email Pro service?
Are you sure you want to delete the following alias from your MX Plan email service?

Either you have not yet added a domain or it has not yet been validated.
You first have to add a domain and then wait until it is validated in order to create an alias for your Email Pro account.
You have reached the 1000 alias limit per Email Pro account.
You have reached the limit of 1,000 aliases per MX Plan email account.
Cancellation of your Email Pro service
Cancel your MX Plan email service

Are you sure you want to delete the "{0}" Email Pro service?
If you do so, automatic renewal will be cancelled at the end of the expiry period, which means the solution will be blocked .
You can continue to use this service as normal until this date.

Are you sure you want to close the "{0}" MX Plan email service?
This action will cancel automatic renewal after the expiry date, and the service will no longer be available after this point.
You can use your service normally until this date.

Warning: you are about to cancel your "{0}" service as well as the attached {1} Email Pro accounts.
Are you sure you want to do this?

Please note that you are about to close the "{0}" service, as well as the {1} MX Plan email accounts associated with it.
Are you sure you want to do this?
The Email Pro service will be deleted on the expiry date.
The MX Plan email service will be closed on its expiry date.
An error has occurred deleting your Email Pro service.
An error has occurred closing your MX Plan email service.
Email Pro service will be renewed on the expiry date.
The MX Plan email service will be renewed on its expiry date.

Cancellation of the "{0}" Email Pro service is planned for the expiry date.
Are you sure that you no longer wish to cancel? The service will then go into automatic renewal.

Your "{0}" MX Plan email service is scheduled to close on its expiry date.
Are you sure you want to cancel this service closure? If so, your email service will be switched to automatic renewal.
Add a domain to create Email Pro accounts. Click
Ajoutez un domaine afin de créer des comptes MX Plan. Cliquez
If you are using nonauthoritative mode (Email Pro + another email system) with another email system not hosted by OVH:
Si vous utilisez le mode non autoritatif (E-mail MX Plan + autre système de messagerie) avec un système de messagerie non hébergé par OVH :
If you are using authoritative mode (only Email Pro) or nonauthoritative with an email system hosted by OVH:
Si vous utilisez le mode autoritatif (E-mail MX Plan uniquement) ou non autoritatif avec un système de messagerie hébergé (e-mail mutualisé) par OVH :

If the domain is managed by a different NIC handle to the Email Pro solution, or if your domain is not hosted at OVH, you cannot configure it automatically. Please manually create the MX record for this domain using the details below.

Si le domaine n'est pas géré par le même identifiant client que le service E-mail MX Plan ou si votre domaine n'est pas hébergé chez OVH, la configuration automatique n'est pas possible. Veuillez créer le champ MX sur ce domaine manuellement en donnant les mêmes informations que ci-dessous.

If the domain is managed by a different NIC handle to the Email Pro solution, or if your domain is not hosted at OVH, you cannot configure it automatically. Please manually create the SRV record for this domain using the details below.

Si le domaine n'est pas géré par le même identifiant client que le service E-mail MX Plan ou si votre domaine n'est pas hébergé chez OVH, la configuration automatique n'est pas possible. Veuillez créer le champ SRV sur ce domaine manuellement en donnant les mêmes informations que ci-dessous.
Withdraw this domain from Email Pro services
Retirer ce domaine des services E-mail MX Plan
This domain cannot be deleted because it is still being used by one or more Email Pro accounts
Ce domaine ne peut pas être supprimé car il est encore utilisé par un ou plusieurs compte E-mail MX Plan
Commander des comptes E-mail MX Plan
Please choose the type of payment and the number of Email Pro accounts to order.
Veuillez choisir le type de paiement puis le nombre de comptes E-mail MX Plan à commander.
Commande de comptes E-mail MX Plan en cours...
Ajouter un compte E-mail MX Plan
An error has occurred loading Email Pro account options.
Une erreur est survenue lors du chargement des options du compte E-mail MX Plan.

You have not yet added a domain, or it has not yet been validated.
First, you need to add a domain, and then wait for it to be validated in order to create an Email Pro account.

Vous n'avez pas encore ajouté de domaine ou il n'a pas encore été validé.
Vous devez d'abord ajouter un domaine et attendre qu'il soit validé pour créer un compte E-mail MX Plan.
An error has occurred creating the Email Pro account
Une erreur est survenue lors de la création du compte E-mail MX Plan.
The password must not contain all or part of the display name or Email Pro username.
Le mot de passe ne peut pas contenir tout ou une partie du nom à afficher ou du login E-mail MX Plan.
Le mot de passe ne peut pas contenir tout ou une partie du nom à afficher ou du login Mx Plan.
Modifier le compte E-mail MX Plan

You can change the Email Pro account security policy by imposing a minimum level of complexity for passwords.
To do this, click the"Manage the security policy" button on your service's dashboard.

Vous pouvez modifier la politique de sécurité des comptes E-mail MX Plan en imposant, par exemple, un niveau de compléxité minimal pour les mots de passe.
Pour ce faire, cliquez sur le bouton "Gérer la politique de sécurité" sur le tableau de bord de votre service.
The Email Pro GUID is the unique internal ID for your mailbox
L'E-mail MX Plan GUID est l'identifiant unique interne de votre boîte aux lettres
The Email Pro configuration is going to be modified.
La configuration du compte E-mail MX Plan va être modifiée.
We were unable to customise the Email Pro email address. There could be another configuration (email, redirection, answering machine) with the same name.
L'adresse e-mail E-mail MX Plan n'a pas pu être personnalisée. Il est possible qu'une configuration mutualisée (mail, redirection, répondeur) existe avec le même nom.
The password for the Email Pro account will change.
Le mot de passe du compte E-mail MX Plan va être modifié.
Modifier le compte E-mail MX Plan
Le mot du passe du compte {{accountEmailAddress}} n'a pas été modifié. Merci de réessayer ultérieusement.
Are you sure you want to reset the following account on your Email Pro service?
Voulez-vous réellement réinitialiser le compte suivant de votre service E-mail MX Plan ?

Resetting an account deletes the data and associated name, but you will continue to be charged for this account. If you no longer want to be billed, click "billing mode", then click "none" for the account in question, and confirm.
La réinitialisation d'un compte consiste à supprimer les données et le nom associé, il pourra ensuite être de nouveau configuré.
The account on your Email Pro service will be reset.
Le compte de votre service E-mail MX Plan va être réinitialisé.
An error has occurred resetting the account on your Email Pro service.
Une erreur est survenue lors de la réinitialisation du compte de votre service E-mail MX Plan.

Vade Secure anti-spam is compatible with nonauthoritative mode (only if your POP/IMAP accounts are hosted at OVH). If this is the case, we would recommend that you use: {0}, {1}, {2} and {3}
If you use nonauthoritative mode with email accounts that are not hosted at OVH, you must use: {4} (see associated domains section)
Nonauthoritative mode (Email Pro + another email service)
Non-autoritatif (E-mail MX Plan + autre service de messagerie)
Authoritative mode means you cannot use another emailing system with Email Pro accounts. This mode enables antispam Vade Secure activation.
Le mode autoritatif ne permet pas l'usage d'un autre système de messagerie avec des comptes E-mail MX Plan. Ce mode permet l'activation de l'antispam Vade Secure.

In nonauthoritative mode, you can use Email Pro alongside another email solution. Vade Secure anti-spam is compatible if the POP/IMAP accounts are hosted at OVH (MX Plan or web hosting). In this instance, you must enter mx1.mail.ovh.net as the target email server.

Le mode non-autoritatif permet une cohabitation entre E-mail MX Plan et un autre service de messagerie. L'antispam Vade Secure est compatible si les comptes pop/imap sont hébergés chez OVH (mxplan ou offre mutualisée), il faut indiquer dans ce cas mx1.mail.ovh.net en serveur e-mail cible.
Are you sure you want to change the following domain for your Email Pro service?
Etes-vous sûr de vouloir modifier le domaine suivant de votre service E-mail MX Plan ?

By default, when adding a domain to the Email Pro server, it is configured in authoritative mode. This means that when you send an email to the address of the domain managed on the server, the server will only look to see if the address is on the Email Pro server.
On the other hand, if you switch the domain to nonauthoritative mode, when you send an email, we will first check if the address is on the Email Pro server, and if it isn't, the Email Pro server will redirect the message to the MX server that you have configured.
You can use the domain in nonauthoritarian mode if, for example, you want to manage one part of your email on the Email Pro service and another part on an external server.
Please note, If you want to use the Email Pro service and the OVH email hosting service, you must enter the value mx1.ovh.net. in the "Target email server" field in the box to the left of this message.

Par défaut, lorsque vous ajoutez votre domaine sur le serveur E-mail MX Plan, il se trouve en mode autoritatif. C'est-à-dire que lorsque vous envoyez un e-mail à l'adresse du domaine géré sur le serveur, ce dernier va regarder exclusivement sur le serveur E-mail MX Plan si l'adresse est présente.
En revanche, si vous basculez le domaine en mode non-autoritatif, lors de l'envoi du e-mail, nous allons vérifier dans un premier temps si l'adresse e-mail est présente sur le serveur E-mail MX Plan, et si ce n'est pas le cas, ce dernier relayera votre message sur le serveur MX que vous avez défini.
Le domaine en mode non-autoritatif peut être utilisé si vous souhaitez, par exemple, gérer une partie de vos e-mails sur E-mail MX Plan et une autre partie sur un serveur externe.
Attention, si vous souhaitez utiliser le service E-mail MX Plan et le service e-mail mutualisé OVH, vous devez dans le champ "Serveur e-mail cible" du formulaire de gauche renseigner cette valeur : mx1.ovh.net.
Are you sure you want to delete the following domain from your Email Pro service?
Etes-vous sûr de vouloir réellement supprimer le domaine suivant de votre service E-mail MX Plan ?
The domain will be deleted from your Email Pro service.
Le domaine va être supprimé de votre service E-mail MX Plan.
An error has occurred deleting the domain from your Email Pro service.
Une erreur est survenue lors de la suppression du domaine de votre service E-mail MX Plan.
Delegation grants other Email Pro accounts some rights on the {0} account
Une délégation permet à d'autres comptes E-mail MX Plan d'avoir certains droits sur le compte {0}
You can create one signature per validated domain.
Please use the formatting tools in the toolbar above the text box to customise and format your signature.
This signature will be included automatically at the bottom of all emails sent from email addresses associated with your Email Pro domain.
Cette signature sera intégrée automatiquement au bas de chaque message envoyé depuis les adresses associées à votre domaine E-mail MX Plan.
You can also use variables to customise the generic signature, with details for individual employees.
To add an image or logo, click on the "image" button (landscape icon in the toolbar), and insert the URL of the image or logo.
Are you sure you want to delete the following Email Pro signature?
Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer la signature suivante de votre service E-mail MX Plan ?
Are you sure you want to add the resource account below to the Email Pro server?
Etes-vous sûr de vouloir ajouter le compte de ressource ci-dessous au serveur E-mail MX Plan ?

You have not yet added a domain, or it has not yet been validated.
First, you need to add a domain, and then wait for it to be validated in order to create an Email Pro account.

Vous n'avez pas encore ajouté de domaine ou il n'a pas encore été validé.
Vous devez d'abord ajouter un domaine et attendre qu'il soit validé pour créer un compte E-mail MX Plan.
Do you want to delete the following resource account from your Email Pro service?
Voulez-vous supprimer le compte de ressource suivant de votre service E-mail MX Plan ?
The resource account will be deleted from your Email Pro service.
Le compte de ressource va être supprimé de votre service E-mail MX Plan.
A delegation allows other Pro e-mail accounts to have certain rights on the resource {0}
A delegation allows other MX Plan e-mail accounts to have certain rights on the resource {0}

Email reception is not affected. When your account is blocked due to spam, this is visible in the email account section or your Email Pro service. A SPAM tag is displayed. Click on it to be redirected to the email received following the block.

La réception n'est pas impactée. Lorsque votre compte est bloqué pour spam, celui-ci est visible depuis votre service E-mail MX Plan section compte e-mail. Un tag SPAM est indiqué. Vous pouvez cliquer dessus afin d'être redirigé vers l'e-mail reçu suite au blocage.
In this instance your subscription is no longer active, email delivery and reception is disabled. Please contact our Email Pro support team on 0333 370 0425 to re-enable the service.
Dans ce cas votre abonnement n'est plus actif, la réception et l'envoi sont désactivés. Il est nécessaire de contacter notre support E-mail MX Plan au 1007 afin de réactiver votre service.
You can set up a security policy from your Email Pro service. Your account may be blocked for a certain time period while this policy is being configured.

Depuis votre service E-mail MX Plan, il est possible de définir une politique de sécurité. Cela peut entrainer un blocage du compte pendant un délai déterminé lors de la configuration de cette politique.

If your account is blocked during this process, you can either wait until the specified time has elapsed so that the account is unblocked or contact our Email Pro support by creating a support request.

Si vous rencontrez un blocage à ce niveau, vous pouvez soit patienter que le délai indiqué soit écoulé afin que le compte se débloque ou contacter notre support E-mail MX Plan en créant une demande d’assistance.
You can also update your password from the Email Pro solution > email account tab > restart your diagnostic. If the problem continues, please open a support ticket.

Vous pouvez aussi mettre à jour le mot de passe depuis votre service E-mail MX Plan, onglet compte e-mail puis relancer votre diagnostic et si le souci persiste vous pouvez créer une demande d’assistance.
Here are the correct MX servers for the Email Pro service:
Voici les serveurs MX valides pour l'offre E-mail MX Plan :
Email Pro + POP/IMAP email hosted at OVH: mx1.mail.ovh.net
E-mail MX Plan + E-mail pop/imap hébergé par OVH : mx1.mail.ovh.net
Email Pro + POP/IMAP email not hosted at OVH: ex.mail.ovh.net ou ex2.mail.ovh.net
E-mail MX Plan + E-mail pop/imap non hébergé par OVH : ex.mail.ovh.net ou ex2.mail.ovh.net
Here are the correct MX servers for the Email Pro service:
Voici les serveurs MX valides pour l'offre E-mail MX Plan :
Email Pro + POP/IMAP email hosted at OVH: mx1.mail.ovh.net
E-mail MX Plan + E-mail pop/imap hébergé par OVH : mx1.mail.ovh.net
Email Pro + POP/IMAP email not hosted at OVH: ex.mail.ovh.net ou ex2.mail.ovh.net
E-mail MX Plan + E-mail pop/imap non hébergé par OVH : ex.mail.ovh.net ou ex2.mail.ovh.net
An SRV record is needed in order to automatically configure your Email Pro account on a compatible email client
L'enregistrement SRV est nécessaire pour la configuration automatique de votre compte E-mail MX Plan sur un logiciel de messagerie compatible
Here is the SRV record required for an Email Pro service:
Voici le champ SRV requis pour une offre E-mail MX Plan :
Un incident sur l'infrastructure E-mail MX Plan
Delegation grants other Email Pro accounts certain rights on the {0} group
Une délégation permet à d'autres comptes E-mail MX Plan d'avoir certains droits sur le groupe {0}

The group enables multiple Email Pro users to receive emails sent to a single address: the group address. The address must be unique and emails sent to it will be transferred to all members of the group.

Le groupe permet à plusieurs utilisateurs E-mail MX Plan de recevoir les e-mails envoyés à une adresse unique : l’adresse du groupe. Cette adresse doit être unique et les messages qui y seront envoyés seront transférés à tous les membres du groupe.
Summary of your {0} Email Pro service configuration
Récapitulatif de configuration pour votre service E-mail MX Plan {0}
The quota specified takes into account the backups and files needed for the Email Pro system to work.
Le quota indiqué prend en compte les sauvegardes et les fichiers nécessaires au fonctionnement du système E-mail MX Plan.

The resource accounts feature lets you plan the needs of your associates.
You can create as many resource accounts as you need.
Commander des comptes E-mail MX Plan
Are you sure you want to add the domain below to your Email Pro server?
Etes-vous sûr de vouloir ajouter le domaine ci-dessous au serveur E-mail MX Plan ?
The domain will be added to your Email Pro server.
L'ajout du domaine à votre serveur E-mail MX Plan va être effectué.

You can't create a signature per validated domain. All your valid domain alreeady have a signature.
Activate the signature for outgoing mail only
However, an error occurred on changing the password.
An error occurred during the request, the modifications will not be applied.

This security setting determines whether passwords must meet complexity requirements
If this policy is enabled, passwords must meet the following minimum requirements when they are changed or created:
Does not contain all or part of the user's account name
Is at least 6 characters long
Contains characters from three of the following four categories:
Uppercase characters from the English alphabet (A to Z)
Lowercase characters from the English alphabet (a to z)
Base 10 digits (0 to 9)
Non-alphanumeric characters (for example, !, $, #, %) Complexity requirements are enforced when passwords are changed or created.

This security setting determines the number of minutes a locked-out account remains locked out before automatically becoming unlocked. The available range is from 1 minute to 90 minutes
If an account lockout threshold is defined, the account lockout duration must be greater than or equal to the reset time.

This security setting determines the number of minutes that must elapse after a failed logon attempt before the counter is reset to 0. The available range is 1 minute to 90 minutes.
If an account lockout threshold is defined, this reset time must be less than or equal to the Account lockout duration.

This security setting determines the number of failed login attempts that causes a user account to be locked out. A locked-out account cannot be used until it is reset by an administrator or until the lockout duration for the account has expired. You can set a value between 1 and 14 failed logon attempts. If you set the value to 0, the account will never be locked out.

This security setting determines the period (in days) that a password can be used before the system asks the user to change it. You can set passwords to expire after a certain number of days between 1 and 90, or you can specify that passwords never expire by setting this number to 0. If the maximum password lifetime is between 1 and 90 days, the minimum password lifetime must be less. If the maximum password lifetime is set to 0, the minimum password lifetime can be any value between 0 and 90.

This security setting determines the period of time (in days) that a password can be used before the user can change it. You can set passwords to expire after a number of days between 1 and 90, or you can allow changes immediately by setting the number of days to 0.

This security setting determines the minimum number of characters that a user account password can contain. You can set a value of between 3 and 14 characters, or you can specify that no password is required by setting this number of characters to 0.
If you enter "0", the account will never be locked.
If you enter "0", the password will always be valid.
If you enter "0", you will allow instant password changes.
If you enter "0", no password is required
